name: Contrail
description:
Contrail is a competitive multiplayer game where players fly around a unique space and attempt to cut one another off by creating a collidable trail. The trails persists on the map, creating more obstacles overtime for the players to avoid. Navigate through a player-authored puzzle in the survival and race modes.

VIDEO

  • Daniel Song - Designer
  • Trevor Siegler - Programmer
  • Adam Griff - Programmer

  • John Micensky - Audio
